opportunities.title: Grocery Delivery Integration
opportunities.description: Direct integration with Instacart, Amazon Fresh, Walmart to add recipe ingredients to cart
opportunities.revenue_potential: High - Affiliate commissions (2.5-5% per order), increased user retention
opportunities.competitive_advantage: Most recipe apps show ingredients but don't enable purchase
validation_needed: User willingness to purchase ingredients via app
Conversion rate from recipe view to cart add

opportunities.title: Voice-Activated Recipe Generation
opportunities.description: Alexa/Google Home skills for hands-free recipe suggestions in kitchen
opportunities.revenue_potential: Medium - Increases engagement, potential voice commerce
opportunities.competitive_advantage: Natural use case (kitchen hands-free), unique in recipe space

opportunities.title: Vertical Diet Specialization
opportunities.description: Deep focus on specific diets: keto, autoimmune, FODMAP, vegan, etc. with specialized AI
opportunities.revenue_potential: High - Premium pricing ($15-25/month), dedicated user base
opportunities.competitive_advantage: Deeper expertise than generic apps, less competition

opportunities.title: B2B2C Wellness Platform Integration
opportunities.description: White-label meal planning for employer wellness programs, health insurance, healthcare platforms
opportunities.revenue_potential: Very High - $5-20 per employee/month, long contracts
opportunities.competitive_advantage: Multi-tenancy already built, existing enterprise infrastructure

opportunities.title: SEO Content Marketing Strategy
opportunities.description: Publish 'What to make with X ingredients' articles for organic search traffic
opportunities.revenue_potential: Medium - Low acquisition cost, high lifetime value
opportunities.competitive_advantage: Leverages existing AI for content generation, Yummly model proven

opportunities.title: Photo-Based Ingredient Recognition
opportunities.description: Computer vision to detect ingredients from pantry photos, auto-generate recipes
opportunities.competitive_advantage: Removes manual entry friction, no competitor has this

opportunities.title: Batch Meal Prep Planner
opportunities.description: Generate weekly meal prep plans that maximize efficiency, minimize waste

opportunities.title: User-Specific AI Fine-Tuning
opportunities.description: Fine-tune models on user interaction data to improve personalization over time
opportunities.revenue_potential: High - Creates switching cost, data moat

opportunities.title: Restaurant Recipe Partnerships
opportunities.description: Partner with restaurants to feature official recipes, drive traffic
opportunities.revenue_potential: Medium - Content marketing, potential revenue share

opportunities.title: Integrated Nutrition Tracking
opportunities.description: Add macro/micronutrient tracking, health goal alignment to recipes
opportunities.revenue_potential: Medium - Premium feature, health focus = higher willingness to pay

market_insights.highest_roi: Grocery integration and content marketing (high impact, medium effort)
market_insights.biggest_moat: AI personalization and diet specialization (data moat, niche focus)
market_insights.biggest_risk: Over-engineering innovation before validating core (ingredient recognition)
market_insights.market_timing: Grocery delivery and diet specialization are hot markets with proven demand

week_1_2: Diet market sizing: keto, vegan, autoimmune
